name: Microsoft Flight simulator Skåne edition
description:
Fly over all of Skåne in this free game available for Windows and Android. You are chased by another plane for some reason.  Skåne is an region in Sweden if you don't know. 

Controls: use wasd to move and ctrl to brake. If you're using an gamepad simply move the joystick. in Android use the onscreen controls. 

Plane assets are from unity standard assets. Terrain from terrain2stl http://jthatch.com/Terrain2STL/.
